name: Necroid Synchro
effectText: Banish 1 Tuner and up to 2 non-Tuner monsters from your GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Stardust" Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck whose Level equals the total Levels of those banished monsters, but negate its effects. (This is treated as a Synchro Summon.)
